name: Olympia Rising
blurb: Fight, climb, and explore your way through\nthe vast depths of the Underworld on a quest\nto reach Mount Olympus.

rewards.reward:
A "Thank you" email from us 
coupled with our deepest gratitude. 
We’ll even ask Zeus to give you
his blessing.

$5 & a Tweet sharing the Kickstarter will net you one of three exclusive Olympia Rising pixel icons that you can show off to Gods and Peasants alike. DRM-free, digital download of the finished game is also included. If you've previously pledged $5, simply switch to this tier and Tweet to earn this special reward.

DRM-free, digital download of the 
finished game. The Gods will also
write your name in the stars as a
dedicated backer (by stars we mean
game credits).

DRM-free, digital download of the
finished game, your name in the
credits as a backer, and a 
download of the Olympia Rising 
original sound track. Jam out with 
your fellow Olympians.

All the above rewards, plus a PDF
retro-style game manual featuring
original art. We’ll see if Hermes will
be willing to deliver it to you.

All above rewards, plus access to \r\nbeta testing. Play early builds of the game as it's being developed and tell us what you think! You will also be featured in the game\u2019s credits as a valuable (nearly god-like) tester.

All above rewards, plus an official
Olympia Rising t-shirt. You’ll look
so good in this tee that Adonis
himself will be ripe with jealousy.

All above rewards, plus you get to be a townsperson in-game! We'll craft a character in your likeness to populate one of Olympia Rising's Ancient Greek cities. You may be working as a pottery merchant, or a lively goat herder - either way, you'll be embedded in the game world till the end of time. Not even the Greek Gods can exist in two different dimensions at the same time!

All above rewards, plus a limited
edition Olympia Rising poster. 
First come, first serve - an edition
of 25. Apollo has verified that this
poster is worthy of a spot on the
wall of your home.

All above rewards (excluding the
poster), plus a physical
copy of the game manual
containing exclusive content not 
found in the PDF version. You’ll
also receive a small, personal sketch
of one of the characters from the
game. Ares might wage a war
to get his hands on one of these...

All above rewards (excluding the
poster), and an animated pixel
portrait in your likeness. Your
personal portrait will be showcased
in the game's credits, and you will
also be sent the image via email
to use for whatever you’d like.
These one-of-a-kind portraits are
crafted under the watchful
eyes of Hephaestus to maintain
quality control.

All above rewards (excluding the poster), plus you get to become an in-game enemy. All those vengeful spirits roaming the Underworld used to be living people. Who\u2019s to say they weren't you in a past life? Specify a unique idle animation for your personalized dead-spirit self (crafted in your 16-bit likeness) and you\u2019ll soon be watching Iola slice you in two!

All above rewards (excluding the poster), plus the opportunity to help design an underworldy enemy  for Iola to encounter.  Help design its look, the way it  behaves, and its origin. Basically, you get Hades\u2019 job as minion creator.
